author: PlayStation
description:
Master elemental energy in the world of Teyvat on PlayStation®5 with the DualSense® Wireless Controller – Genshin Impact Limited Edition.

Showcasing emblems of twin travellers Aether and Lumine, and featuring their trusted companion guide Paimon, this ethereal white, gold, and green palette is adorned with arcane glyphs of a fantasy realm.

Pre-orders start on December 11, 2025 at 10am local time at direct.playstation.com as well as from select retailers. 

#ps5 #dualsense #genshinimpact
title: Genshin Impact Limited Edition DualSense Controller | PS5

description:

Your target is Slim Shady, the notorious alter ego of Eminem who’s lyrical genius is
only matched by his talent for chaos.
Track him down in the twisted world he created and silence him once and for all.

Destiny 2: Renegades // December 2, 2025.

Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other Guardian
title: Destiny 2 - Renegades Cinematic Trailer | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
MARVEL Cosmic Invasion - Available Now

A cosmic battle awaits! Choose between 15 Marvel Super Heroes in this frenetic action beat ‘em up to fight against the deadly Annihilation Wave threatening the galaxy. From New York City to the depths of the Negative Zone, the future of the Marvel Universe will be fought for across the stars!

© 2025 MARVEL. Game Software © 2025 Dotemu. Developed by Tribute Games.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013900

Styx is missing.
No snark. No footsteps in the rafters. No loot mysteriously disappearing.
Just… silence. And that’s honestly the scariest part.

Styx returns on February 19, 2026.

Slip once more into the grimy boots of Styx and lead your crew through a crumbling empire built for betrayal, blades, and very poor workplace safety standards.

Outsmart, outstab and outsteal your enemies.
Explore 3 towering environments crafted for vertical stealth.
Chase Quartz, because power, war, and shiny things are always worth the trouble.

This isn’t just a comeback. It’s a warning:
A single goblin with a dagger can still ruin everyone’s day.

#ps5 #ps5games #styx 

Rated Mature
title: Styx: Blades of Greed - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games
